title: Ticket #327: [RFE] MATCH/ADMIN_REQUIREMENTS
description:
Should we add a MATCH_REQUIREMENTS that is set in the Negotiator's configuration? It would take as context a job ad, a match ad, and extra negotiator attributes (such as current quota usages and priorities, see V7.2 3.4.3).

How is this different from APPEND_REQUIREMENTS? It can be configured in one location to alter behavior, instead of on each Schedd plus a qedit for existing jobs. It would have access to attributes from V7.2's 3.4.3.
